landing_screen.title: Let AI Agents Agree - and Record It for You
landing_screen.subtitle_1: Your devices talk, negotiate, and align on terms.
landing_screen.subtitle_2: DAIA makes sure those agreements are recorded and verifiable - automatically.

cards.title: AI Agents Negotiate
cards.description: AI agents communicate and negotiate with each other to reach mutually beneficial agreements automatically.

cards.title: Secure Blockchain Recording
cards.description: DAIA records their agreement securely on blockchain, creating an immutable and transparent record.

cards.title: Encrypted & Verifiable
cards.description: Agreements are encrypted for privacy while remaining verifiable by authorized parties when needed.

features.title: Automatic Agreement Recording
features.description: No manual intervention required - agreements are recorded automatically when AI agents reach consensus.

features.title: Immutable & Transparent
features.description: Blockchain technology ensures agreements cannot be altered and remain verifiable by all parties.

features.title: Privacy Protected
features.description: Advanced encryption keeps sensitive agreement details private while maintaining verifiability.

features_without.title: Manual Verification Required
features_without.description: Agreements rely on centralized logs or require manual checks, leading to disputes and delays.

features_without.title: Tampering Risk
features_without.description: Traditional databases are susceptible to alteration, making the agreement history untrustworthy.

features_without.title: Data Exposure
features_without.description: Sensitive agent data and negotiation terms are often stored in plain text or vulnerable systems.

explore_section.title: Ready to Explore DAIA?
explore_section.subtitle: Start by searching for existing agreements or learn more about how DAIA can help your AI agents work together.

search_view.msg_no_filter_match: No agreements found matching the current filters.

footer.slogan: Secure agreement recording for AI agents on blockchain.

no_agreements_found.title: No agreements found!
no_agreements_found.description: Looks like there are no agreements tied to this address. Is it a valid one?

sdk_screen.title: Integrate DAIA SDK into Your AI Agents
sdk_screen.subtitle_1: From proposal to blockchain in seconds
sdk_screen.subtitle_2: DAIA SDK handles the entire agreement lifecycle for your agents.

sdk_features.title: SDK Features
sdk_features.subtitle: Built for modern AI agents and blockchain integration

cards.title: Encrypted blockchain storage
cards.description: Protect sensitive data on-chain. DAIA encrypts content before storage, keeping agreements private without losing transparency.

cards.title: Lightweight SDK
cards.description: Optimized for edge and serverless. No bloat - just clean, async code. Plug and go.

cards.title: Simple integration
cards.description: Drop DAIA into any AI logic reactive, stateful, or event-driven. Works out of the box with your existing setup.

sdk_integration_steps.title: Quick Integration
sdk_integration_steps.subtitle: Get started with JavaScript in minutes

step2.title: Initialize Agent
step2.codeSnippet:
import { DaiaAgent } from '@daia/sdk'
const agent = new DaiaAgent({ id: 'AGENT-01', wallet: '0xabc...' })

step3.title: Save Propose Offer on blockchain
step3.codeSnippet:
const proposeOfferId = await agent.recordProposeOffer({
  content: "
Proposing an offer:
  • Duration: 3 hours
  • Base rate: 6 PLN/h
  • Eco vehicle discount: -1 PLN/h
  • Final rate: 5 PLN/h
  • Total cost: 15 PLN
",
  encryptKey: 'xyz' // or undefined to display data without being encrypted
});

step4.title: Save Accept Offer on blockchain using other agent

agreement_details_tooltips.req_type: The type of cryptographic requirement needed to fulfill this agreement (e.g., 'sign' requires a digital signature).
agreement_details_tooltips.proposer_pubkey: The full public key of the party that initiated this agreement offer.
agreement_details_tooltips.offerer_nonce: A unique, random number used by the initiator to prevent replay attacks and ensure transaction uniqueness.

details_view.err_missing_params: Wallet address or transaction ID missing from URL.
details_view.err_tx_not_found: Transaction not found in the wallet history.

ready_to_explore_documentation.title: Ready to integrate DAIA?
ready_to_explore_documentation.subtitle: If you're interested in integrating and securing AI agent agreements on the blockchain using DAIA, check out our documentation.

about_us_view.main_title: About DAIA: The Open Protocol for AI Agents
about_us_view.subtitle_1: Combining AI, Blockchain, and open standards to build the future of autonomous systems.
about_us_view.subtitle_2: Securely recording agreements for the next generation of digital cooperation.

mission_section.heading: Our Mission
mission_section.paragraph_1: DAIA was created to solve a fundamental limitation in today’s AI ecosystem: the lack of a trusted, verifiable way for AI agents to collaborate, exchange data, execute tasks, and settle payments without exposing users to fraud, misuse or costly mistakes.
mission_section.paragraph_2: Modern agent systems are closed, opaque, and difficult to verify. They cannot reliably operate across organizational boundaries, and they offer no standard mechanism for accountability or trust. As a result, AI still cannot take over many repetitive, well-defined tasks that burden people and companies - even though the technology itself is ready.
mission_section.paragraph_3: DAIA introduces an open protocol that enables AI agents to negotiate, agree, verify, and enforce commitments in a fully decentralized way.

goal_section.heading: Our Goal
goal_section.intro: Our goal is to provide an open standard that allows:
goals_list: AI agents to operate like real economic actors - forming agreements, negotiating terms, keeping a verifiable history, settling payments, and taking responsibility for their actions.
People and organizations to offload repetitive, routine processes to autonomous agents without sacrificing trust or control.
Developers to build interoperable applications and services that can communicate and transact reliably with agents from other systems.
AI to become socially useful at scale, grounded in transparency, auditability, and a shared protocol rather than proprietary black boxes.
goal_section.technology_paragraph: To achieve this, we leverage the BSV blockchain - a low-cost, scalable BTC fork - to record interactions and micropayments as immutable, auditable events accessible to all participants without intermediaries.

transparency_section.heading: Trust & Transparency
transparency_section.open_source: DAIA is fully open source because broad adoption and trust cannot be built behind closed doors. Our mission is not to create another walled garden, but to provide public infrastructure for autonomous systems - combining AI with verifiable, low-cost blockchain technology.
transparency_section.belief: We believe AI should work for people, not the other way around.
transparency_section.protocol: And for AI to assist humanity safely and at scale, it needs a protocol everyone can trust. DAIA is designed to be that protocol.

support_view.title: Need Help? Contact Support.
support_view.subtitle: Submit a bug report, request a new feature, or ask a question directly on our GitHub repository.

agreement_proofs.tooltip_proof_type: The type of cryptographic proof included.
agreement_proofs.tooltip_signee_nonce: Random nonce used to prevent replay attacks.
